'''Arciryas''' ([[Quenya|Q]], pron. {{IPA|[ˈarkirʲas]}}) was the younger brother of King [[Narmacil II]].  His great-grandson [[Eärnil II|Eärnil]] would become [[King of Gondor]] after King [[Ondoher]] and both of his sons perished in battle in {{TA|1944}}.<ref>{{App|Gondor}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Arciryas'' is [[Quenya]]. Its meaning is not glossed, but as Paul Strack explains, it seems to mean "Noble Ship" and to be a compound of [[ara|(a)ra]] ("noble") and [[cirya]] ("ship").<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-2363379119.html|articlename=Q. ''Arciryas'' m.|website=Eldamo|accessed=28 July 2021}}</ref>
